- Hired Peter, Kevin, Stuart and Bob to do our secret evil mission
- Introducing "SCOOP Premium" All-You-Can-Read-Magazine
Offering free access to thousands of magazines for only $4.99 a month!
A fun and affordable new offering that let you read as many as best selling titles of magazine as you want!
- Filter option: filter magazine for Premium Subscription only

Try our newest SCOOP Premium - All you can read magazines for all the best selling magazines in Indonesia only for USD 4.99
If your have purchased SCOOP Premium but your subscription status has not yet changed, try to repurchase & you will not charged double for owned item in iTunes purchased :)
Sorry for the inconvenience.

- Now you can see the price in your local currency. Are you ready to shop more?
- Open  your subscription easily from cloud, store, details and anywhere (ex. toilet, bedroom, etc) ~ LOL
- Notify you when you are in slow connection
- And of course, more titles and editions of magazines in SCOOP Premium

Hello readers! SCOOP has updated a better app version for you!

1. Get the list of SCOOP Premium magazine in Premium pop-up
2. Want to know your package expiration date? sure you can see that in User Profile
3. Find the latest promotion easier in Promo List
4. And yes, our app now has a better performance in iOS 9

Hello readers! SCOOP has updated a better app version for you!

1. Get the list of SCOOP Premium magazine in Premium pop-up
2. Want to know your package expiration date? sure you can see that in User Profile
3. Find the latest promotion easier in Promo List
4. And yes, our app now has a better performance in iOS 9

- Now we support iOS 9 !
- Hey Parents! Control what your kids read with parental control and TouchID. So it can block any inappropriate content for them.

- Now we support iOS 9 !
- Hey Parents! Control what your kids read with parental control and TouchID. So it can block any inappropriate content for them.
- Bug Fixes
- Bug Fixes

- Say Goodbye to your scattered cloud! Now your favorite items will be delivered in customized folders!
- We know everybody loves to get recommendation for reading, so enjoy our book recommendation section on “book" tab~ (only available on iPhone and iPod)
- Your already-settled collection won't get lost!  you can access your customized collection in your library in a better way.
- Added search bar at Cloud. looking for your favorite items? nobody said it was(not) easy....
- ...and many improvements for the best reading experience!

- Want to refresh your cloud? Just pull then you’ll get it!
- We improved our layout so you can experience our app better :)
- Some bugs that caused the store page not working well was fixed!

Enjoy Reading, people!

It’s April, and we present you latest version of our app!
- Got curious to see what’s inside any items? Need a sneak peek of its content? Now you might see its preview before you purchase it
- We fixed crashes in iOS 7 and improved every details in app. Please check our app to see the improvements.

Enjoy, readers :)

Enjoy, readers :)

A long time ago in a galaxy far, far away....


Episode 4.8.2
Trivial Bug Fixes

The obsession of delivering the best reading experience for you leads our team to fix some trivial bugs.

While the bugs are unworthy to be described in details, this is our way to show commitment to SCOOPers.

We bring a powerful new dimension with 3D Touch in Gramedia Digital. Quick actions let you do the things you do most often, faster and in fewer steps. Also peek and pop to let you preview all kinds of content without having to actually open it.

New year, new identity : D
Happy e-reading!

Hello.
I know you are disappointed and want a cool update.
But sorry this time it just bug fixes and face lifting our premium banner.
Give this app a chance to be better for you by giving us feedback by email.
Thank you.
Happy e-reading!

iOS 13 User: "I disappointed with this updated! The reader layout is broken!" 
CS : "Mayday mayday!"
Tech : "Gather our soldier! Let's fix this!"



End of the story
Finally we fix this broken layout. If you find the other problems, report to us by giving us feedback by email. Thank you.
Happy e-reading!
